name: Dungeon Name Generator
description: Unleash the mystery! Craft the perfect, spine-chilling name for your next dungeon crawl with our generator. Guaranteed to make your players tremble... with excitement, of course!
introduction: Tired of calling your underground lair 'Bob's Basement'? Our Dungeon Name Generator is here to rescue your campaign! Whether you need a name that screams 'ancient evil' or whispers 'forgotten treasure,' we've got you covered. Get ready to name your dungeon something truly unforgettable – and maybe slightly terrifying.
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that *doesn't* summon a demon... probably.)
Marvel at the awesome dungeon name that appears before your very eyes!
Repeat until you find the perfect name that sends shivers down your players' spines.
Optional: Add a backstory to your dungeon name to really mess with your players' heads. We highly recommend this.
Share your favorite dungeon name with your fellow game masters and bask in their envy.

faqs.question: Is this generator really free?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We believe everyone deserves a fantastically named dungeon, regardless of their budget. Consider it our gift to the RPG community.

faqs.question: Can I use these names in my published works?
faqs.answer: Go for it! These names are yours to command. Just maybe give us a shout-out if your game becomes a bestseller, okay?

faqs.question: Will these names summon actual monsters?
faqs.answer: While we can't *guarantee* that, we highly recommend having a party of adventurers on standby, just in case. You know, for research purposes.

faqs.question: What if I don't like the names it generates?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! Or get creative and mix and match different parts of the names. The possibilities are as endless as the dungeons themselves!

faqs.question: Is there a limit to how many names I can generate?
faqs.answer: Nope! Generate to your heart's content. We're here to fuel your dungeon-naming obsession. We won't judge (much).

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to be added to the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way and we'll see if they're suitably spooky (or just plain cool) enough to make the cut.
